description: Try our easy to follow Yogurt Pancakes with Bananas & Nutella recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pancake,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,High protein,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Low fat,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Yogurt Pancakes with Bananas & Nutella Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put the flour, baking soda, baking powder and sugar into a large bowl. Add whisked eggs, yogurt and mix gently.
On a heated, dry pan form pancakes with a spoon and fry them over medium heat until golden on both sides.
Spread Nutella® on two pancakes and stack them together. Add a final pancake to the stack and place a few banana pieces on top.
